data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Ordos, Nei Mongol, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ordos, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ordos, Nei Mongol, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Ordos, Nei Mongol, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Ordos, Nei Mongol, China know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Hui, Muslim Chinese people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Ordos do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Ordos, Nei Mongol, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ordos, Nei Mongol, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
